content.body: Does anybody remember why we have a `[no LineTerminator here]` restriction in arrow functions, before `=>`? I don't think it's solving any ambiguity
content.formatted_body: Does anybody remember why we have a [no LineTerminator here] restriction in arrow functions, before =>? I don't think it's solving any ambiguity

content.body: That restriction was added to the ArrowFunction production in draft 24 of ES6 (roughly April 2014?), if that helps you find notes.
